oeuvres.publication: Expériences touristiques et trajectoires de vie
La recherche en train de se faire

corps.paragraphe: Each issue of Via includes a section "Pictures", in which are published photographs related to tourism and recreation. For this issue dedicated to concepts, we asked the authors of the main articles to provide and comment on a photograph illustrating their way of doing research. This photograph could represent the author in action - in his office, visiting the field or attending a seminar - as the objects or places that influenced his analysis of tourism. Beyond their great diversity, the photographs collected here confirm the crucial importance of confronting the field in the process of producing concepts.
